ygData.subject: Re: EQ
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I ve used a few Velium weapons and found the proc to be slightly helpful.  It s only a 10 point DD.  The main use of them is that they are magic, so you
ygData.messageBody:
--- In EverQuest@y..., Bobby wells <xsdcsd@y...> wrote:
> The message says "Your will is not strong enough to
> command this weapon" it means your not at the level
> that it procs at yet. Velium weapons Proc at 25.
>
I've used a few Velium weapons and found the proc to be slightly
helpful. It's only a 10 point DD. The main use of them is that they
are magic, so you can hit those pesky wisps, and they are quick. You
can also find Frozen weapons, which have a better ratio then Velium
in the same type of weapon.

In all my time playing I have seldom found anything you can get from
a quest that compares to an item you can buy. My SSoM was about the
only useful weapon I've gotten, and I just replaced it with a Yak.
And yes, "My will is not strong enough to command this weapon"! LOL

Tuldayen
34th season Ranger of Tunare
